articles.title: Threads, Instagram’s Twitter competitor, is expected July 6 - TechCrunch
articles.description: Instagram's rumored Twitter competitor just dropped on the iOS App Store in the U.S. The app will be called Threads.
articles.content:
Instagram’s rumored Twitter competitor just dropped on the iOS App Store in the U.S. The app will be called Threads, and according to App Store data, it’s expected to launch on July 6.

articles.title: “I Have a Problem With the Stealing of My Material”: A Common Rallying Cry Emerges On AI - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: As Hollywood execs begin to test artificial intelligence, from using the tech to de-age actors to partnering with companies in the field to create AI-composed music, key players in the industry are pushing for regulations — or lawsuits.
